message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. Would you be interested in purchasing it for $12000?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I'm not sure I can meet you at $9000. Would you be willing to meet me at $11000?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I'm glad you're still interested in the product, Bob! However, I'm not sure I can meet you at $9500. Would you be willing to meet me at $10500?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $9750. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
